title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.7 - Notice of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.7 - Notice of hearing

State Regulations

On receipt of application in proper form the commission
will set a time and place for the holding of a hearing thereon and will send a
copy of such notice to the applicant and a copy of the notice and of the
petition and exhibits to the other party in the proceedings, together with an
invitation to such party to file an answer if it so desires. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
603.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
